pullRequest.title: Fixing Temperature Display for Degree Symbol
pullRequest.bodyText: Currently, the degree symbol does not show as a degree symbol but instead as a set of chars. This fixes it by using the unicode for the symbol instead of just the symbol.

commit.message: Fixed Temperature display issues on the planet, and added a note regarding display in the planetary event display editor

nodes.bodyText: Only actual changes in this file is here. Rest is automatic whitespace changes.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -59,6 +59,7 @@ save.text=Save
 setDay.tooltip=Set Event Day
 shortName.text=Short name
 socioindustrial.text=Socio-industrial index
+#note that the temperature displayed below might not work as intended, and the unicode "\u00B0" should replace the degree symbol in that case
 temperature.combined.format=%d°C
